prev.title: 这是Gilbert Strang教授的线性代数教材
prev.summary: 这是Gilbert Strang教授的线性代数教材。学习网上的MIT18.06课程时应配合本教材学习。 上面的网址是原版的介绍，下面的网址是清华大学出版社影印版的介绍。截至目前为止并没有出版的中文版。

next.title: Refactoring and Design Patterns
next.summary: Refactoring is a controllable process of improving code without creating new functionality. Design Patterns are typical solutions to the commonly occurring problems in software design.
